thread.title: Zuzanna Bilińska
thread.title_full: Majawidu BV / Bye Bra Beoordeeld door Zuzanna Bilińska

author: Zuzanna Bilińska
title: Zuzanna Bilińska
text: I've ordered a package of bye bra stripes without reading all the details about the delivery options. I've chosen the free shipping and mailed the customer service about the order confirmation. Since my first mail I was in touch with Lindy who was talking care of my "case". In a nutshell, my first item was lost during the delivery ( therefore, I don't recommend the free shipping option), Lindy proposed to send another one before the investigation with the post office will be finished. I got the second one within few days. Eventually, the first package reached also my address with a bit of a delay ( 5 weeks after the purchase). I've been offered to keep both of the items to compensate the delivery story. To sum up, despite the problems encountered during the delivery I am still very satisfied with the quality of the service. Thank you Lindy.
